original: Tattha katame cattāro maggasamaṅgino, cattāro phalasamaṅgino puggalā?
analyzed: ▁tattha ▁katame ▁cattāro ▁magg a samaṃgi no ▁cattāro ▁phal a samaṃgi no ▁puggal ā
▁sak a dā gāmī ▁sakadāgāmi phal a sacchikiriy āya ▁paṭipanno
▁anā gāmī ▁anā gāmi phal a sacchikiriy āya ▁paṭipanno

original: ime cattāro maggasamaṅgino, ime cattāro phalasamaṅgino puggalā.
analyzed: ▁ime ▁cattāro ▁magg a samaṃgi no ▁ime ▁cattāro ▁phal a samaṃgi no ▁puggal ā
